verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing, and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> that was with him in the ark: <S%H8392><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> made a wind <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> assuaged; <S%H7918><s%>

The fountains <S%H4599><s%> also of the deep <S%H8415><s%> and the windows <S%H699><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> were stopped, <S%H5534><s%> and the rain <S%H1653><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> was restrained; <S%H3607><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> continually: <S%H1980><s%> <S%H7725><s%> and after the end <S%H7097><s%> of the hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated. <S%H2637><s%>

And the ark <S%H8392><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Ararat. <S%H780><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> decreased <S%H2637><s%> continually <S%H1980><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month: <S%H2320><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, on <S%H5921><s%> the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> were the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> seen. <S%H7200><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that Noah <S%H5146><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> the window <S%H2474><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had made: <S%H6213><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> forth a raven, <S%H6158><s%> which went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to and fro, <S%H7725><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried <S%H3001><s%> up from off <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Also he sent <S%H7971><s%> forth a dove <S%H3123><s%> from him, to see <S%H7200><s%> if the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground; <S%H127><s%>

But the dove <S%H3123><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> rest <S%H4494><s%> for the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot, <S%H7272><s%> and she returned <S%H7725><s%> to him into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> for the waters <S%H4325><s%> were on <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth: <S%H776><s%> then he put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> her, and pulled <S%H935><s%> her in to him into <S%H413><s%> the ark. <S%H8392><s%>
And he stayed <S%H2342><s%> yet other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and again <S%H3254><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> forth the dove <S%H3123><s%> out of the ark; <S%H8392><s%>

And the dove <S%H3123><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in to him in the evening; <S%H6153><s%> and, see, <S%H2009><s%> in her mouth <S%H6310><s%> was an olive <S%H2132><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> plucked <S%H2965><s%> off: so Noah <S%H5146><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And he stayed <S%H3176><s%> yet other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> forth the dove; <S%H3123><s%> which returned <S%H7725><s%> not again <S%H3254><s%> to him any <S%H5750><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> and first <S%H259><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> month, the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried <S%H2717><s%> up from off <S%H5921><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> was dry. <S%H2720><s%>

And in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the seven <S%H7651><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> was the earth <S%H776><s%> dried. <S%H3001><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> you, and your wife, <S%H802><s%> and your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and your sons' <S%H1121><s%>wives <S%H802><s%> with you.

Bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with you every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing that is with you, of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> both of fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and of cattle, <S%H929><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth; <S%H776><s%> that they may breed <S%H8317><s%> abundantly <S%H8317><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and be fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%>wives <S%H802><s%> with him:

Every <S%H3605><s%> beast, <S%H2416><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing, and every <S%H3605><s%> fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and whatever <S%H3605><s%> creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> after their kinds, <S%H4940><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the ark. <S%H8392><s%>

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smelled <S%H7306><s%> a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell; <S%H7381><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> I will not again <S%H3254><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> for man's <S%H120><s%> sake; <S%H5668><s%> for the imagination <S%H3336><s%> of man's <S%H120><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> from his youth; <S%H5271><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I again <S%H3254><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> thing living, <S%H2416><s%> as I have done. <S%H6213><s%>

While <S%H5750><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> remains, <S%H3117><s%> seedtime <S%H2233><s%> and harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and cold <S%H7120><s%> and heat, <S%H2527><s%> and summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter, <S%H2779><s%> and day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> shall not cease. <S%H7673><s%>
